dmca.title: [EV1-C1640004C] mp3nut.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] Posted At: Friday, November 03, 2006 3:45 PM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1640004C] mp3nut.com Subject: [EV1-C1640004C] mp3nut.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. mp3nut.com Added by system at Thursday, Nov 2 2006 08:22 am X-MailFrom: a.moore@palacemarketing.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.212] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu, 2 Nov 2006 08:18:41 -0600 (CST) Received: from cpc1-shep8-0-0-cust914.leic.cable.ntl.com ([82.15.51.147]:3940 helo=andrew) by server.wowringtones.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1GfdOb-0007JZ-GN for abuse@ev1servers.net; Thu, 02 Nov 2006 14:18:18 +0000 Reply-To: From: "Andrew Moore" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: mp3nut.com Subject: mp3nut.com Date: Thu, 2 Nov 2006 14:18:19 -0000 Organization: Palace Marketing Limited Message-ID: <000001c6fe89$c08f9dd0$0302a8c0@andrew> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0001_01C6FE89.C08F9DD0" X-Priority: 3 (Normal) X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook, Build 10.0.2627 Importance: Normal X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - server.wowringtones.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - palacemarketing.co.uk X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: a.moore@palacemarketing.co.uk X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Nov 2006 14:18:41.0502 (UTC) FILETIME=[CC1C4FE0:01C6FE89] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello Ev1, I've just been searching for link partners and found this website which is promoting unlicenced music content and breaches your TOS I beleive. www.mp3nut.com I just ran a whois on the domain and it appears you host it: http://whois.domaintools.com/mp3nut.com They appear to be using a number of free sites to host their illegal content but this site is the hub for it all. I have to pay good money to host licenced music content and don't think these guys should get away with it. If there's anything you can do to stop them it'd be great. Thanks Andy Moore Palace Marketing Limited 44 870 896 5722 44 7921 870 990 www.web2txt.co.uk < ringtones & mobile phone downloads www.palacemarketing.co.uk < mobile content aggregation MIME element (text/html) Message
Hello Ev1,
 
I've just been searching for link partners and found this website which is promoting unlicenced music content and breaches your TOS I beleive.
 
www.mp3nut.com
 
I just ran a whois on the domain and it appears you host it: http://whois.domaintools. com/mp3nut.com
 
They appear to be using a number of free sites to host their illegal content but this site is the hub for it all.
 
I have to pay good money to host licenced music content and don't think these guys should get away with it.
 
If there's anything you can do to stop them it'd be great.
 
Thanks
 
Andy Moore
Palace Marketing Limited
 
44 870 896 5722
44 7921 870 990
 
www.web2txt.co.uk < ringtones & mobile phone downloads
www.palacemarketing.co.uk < mobile content aggregation
 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
